# GamePass_SaveReader.GetIndexFilePath method

Locate containers.index file in game or application folder

```csharp
public string GetIndexFilePath()
```

## Return Value

Full path of containers.index

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| Exception | Raise an exception if containers.index has not been found in game or application folder |
